column4: Can anyone help with graphics cards. I want to enabled 3D using NVIDIA GE-FORCE FX 5500 on Ubuntu 8.10
could you do a  dmesg | grep NVRM
don't what do you have in system > administration > Hardware driver
I activated and download recommended driver 173
I don't like the fact dmesg complains about rivatv
you can through synaptic update to latest drivers
just type nvidia in the package manager
Thanks, I'll install them and let you know
they are fine, I used them
how your install of the nvidia went ?
ok now you have to get rid of all nvidia drivers you have in your system
I uninstalled 173 through synpatico and then installed 180
here is the link for the dmesg | grep NVRM http://www.pastebin.ca/1315930
Also I removed all Nvidia drivers using synpatico
